A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved this Episode. Definitely one of my favorites. I've watched it 3 times within the first 24 hours and can't wait to see it again. It is witty and dramatic with plenty of twists\, turns\, and surprises. I suspect the fans who did not like it either expected the story line to go a certain way and were upset that they were wrong. Or they are \"Originalists\" and nothing will life up to the original trilogy. I was 6 when I say A New Hope\, and nothing will ever replace the thrill or experience of those movies for me; however\, I still appreciated the prequels for what they were and love.the new trilogy because it is meant to be....a new era for a new generation.
